articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Why the "terrible" soft tyre was the best choice for Brazil GP F1 sprint - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1's Brazilian Grand Prix sprint proved to be a battle for tyre survival, as drivers had to obsess more about looking after rubber than being able to push flat out.
articles.content:
Eventual race winner Max Verstappen, who once again showed how good his Red Bull RB19 is at looking after tyres, confessed to being into management mode as soon as he left the pits.
